text: @realDonaldTrump @AlexAzar By Tuesday he will be a coffee boy who Captain Coronavirus barely knew. Remember when Sessions, Tillerson, Kelly and a few dozen others were doing a great job and weren't going to be fired? That's what Azar is. He will be gone but stink of trump for the rest of his life.
